== Purpose of this page ==
This page defines the tests critierias that Unity should pass to enter the devel distribution or any SRU

== Tests ==
The Ubuntu distribution test criterias for Unity (and all related components, including Compiz) to enters the repository is:
* upstream make check should pass, so that the trunk is tagged as "valid"
* the whole autopilot testsuite is passing for all the tests
* all dx manual tests are passing and confirmed to pass by a dx upstream team member.
* manual distro tests that are entered in checkbox (shipped with unity in the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~unity-team/+archive/ppa|daily unity ppa]]</nowiki> are all passing.
